              </p>

              <h4>
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.

      <!---------------------------------------->
      <!---------------------------------------->
      <!---------------------------------------->
      <section id="about">
        <div class="text-about">
          <h3 class="anim" data-delay="0.1s">The dark edge of art nouveau</h3>
          <p class="anim" data-delay="0.3s">
            Melissa Murillo, known as Meyoko, creates the metamorphosis of a
            surreal world inhabited with hybrid characters and peculiar
            fauna.She uses ballpoint pen,watercolor and acrylic to create
            luxuriant forest populated with imaginary plants and bizarre
            characters. Her work often incorporates emotions such as
            melancholia, vulnerability, the fear of abandonment yet she
            confronts them with dogmas such as utopianism, heroism or humanism
            to achieve a narrative dialogue of intense poetry. Meyoko, from
            Equatorial origins, discovered her passion for her art in
            France;<span>
              she subsequently studied in Paris and began illustrating.
              Turbulent times caused her to move to Berlin</span
            >, in an environment more suitable for Meyoko's development and
            personal quest, a path devoted to her art.
          </p>
          <!-- single images -->
          <div class="about-single-image">
            <img
              class="image-sl"
              src="./img/Notos_meyoko.jpg"
              alt="drawing lilith"
            />
          </div>

          <p class="executed anim" data-delay="0.3s">
            Executed in free hand, with a fountain pen and black, China ink or
            more recently with Gold, the artworks by MEYOKO are like secret open
            doorways to a microcosmic wilderness populated by divine entities
            and mythical creatures Each intermingled and amalgamated to one
            another until they ultimately create hybrid shapes that are partly
            botanical partly animal. Dense Forests, made of luxuriant hair like
            roots are adorned with tattooed flowers and surreal plants or
            inhabited by totemic ravens and hummingbirds with strange silky
            bodies in place of feathers.<br /><br />
            <span> Collaborations include:</span>
            Crate and Barrel, Glossy Tv, Lindstrom, LODOWN magazine, Soft
            Gallery, Ikono TV, Gestalten, THE GUARDIAN, Equadorian Embassy and
            Fundacion Guayasamin.
          </p>
          <h4>Text by <span> Joyce Bidouzo Coudray</span></h4>
        </div>

        <!-- double images -->
        <div id="about-twin-images">
          <div class="wrapper-about-img">
            <div class="about-img-one"></div>
            <div class="about-img-two"></div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>
      <!---------------------------------------->
      <!---------------------------------------->
      <!---------------3d------------------------>
      <section id="port3d">
        <div class="port3d-text">
          <h3 class="anim" data-delay="0.1s">The dynamic of contrasts</h3>
          <p class="anim" data-delay="0.3s">
            "From the ancient past, artists have formed images and dreams, fired
            the imagination, built structures of aspirations<span>
              to give the world wings to fly, and the vision to see
            </span>
            new societies in the sky" (1986 in Sky and Space Artist's Manifest).
          </p>
        </div>
        <!-- images -->
        <div class="port-3d-image"></div>
        <!-- ------------------------ -->
        <!-- <div class="carousel-section">

          </div>
        </div> -->
        <!-- -------------------------- -->
        <!-- -------------------------- -->
        <p>
          My works are known to resolve around flora and fauna, but
          <span
            >many are unaware of my fascination with their computerized
            versions</span
          >, and their definite evolution.
        </p>
        <!-- images -->
      </section>
      <!-- -------------------------------------- -->
      <!-------------------------------------------->

    <!-- ---------------------------------- -->
    <!--  -----SCRIPT------------------------->

    <script>
      const images = document.querySelectorAll(".anim");
      //intersectionObserver

      observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach((entry) => {
          if (entry.intersectionRatio > 0) {
            entry.target.style.animation = `anim1 2s  ${entry.target.dataset.delay}  forwards ease-out`;
          } else {
            entry.target.style.animation = "none";
          }
        });
      });
      images.forEach((image) => {
        observer.observe(image);
      });
    </script>

    <!-- ------------------------------ -->
    <!--  -----SCRIPT----------------------->
  </body>
</html>

-----------------------------------

#about {
  width: 100vw;
  background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;

  //  TEXT ABOUT
  .text-about {
    height: auto;
    padding: 200px 0 50px 0;
    margin-top: 50px;
    background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

    @include flex-column-data;

    h3 {
      font-size: 1.3rem;
      text-align: left;
      line-height: 31px;
      margin: 0px 30px 0px 60px;
      font-family: $font_family_thin_naomi_legs;
      color: #000000;
    }
    p {
      width: 70%;
      font-size: 1.3rem;
      text-align: left;
      line-height: 32px;
      padding: 10px 10px 120px 60px;
      font-family: $font_family_thin_naomi_legs;
      font-weight: 100;
      color: #282828;

      span {
        @include underline-simple;
      }
    }
    p.executed {
      width: 65%;
      font-size: 1.3rem;
      text-align: left;
      line-height: 32px;
      padding: 120px 10px 100px 60px;
      font-family: $font_family_thin_naomi_legs;
      font-weight: 100;
      color: #282828;
    }
    h4 {
      padding: 0px 10px 140px 60px;
      padding: 30px;
      color: #666666;
      font-size: 0.8rem;
      font-family: $font_family_thin_naomi_legs;
      text-transform: capitalize;
      color: #212121;

      span {
        color: rgb(98, 98, 98);
        text-transform: capitalize;
        font-family: "Lato";
        font-weight: 100;
        font-size: 0.8rem;
      }
    }
  }
  // ---------single images

  .about-single-image {
    width: 100vw;
    height: auto;
    margin: 0 0 0px 0;

    background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    .image-sl {
      @include flex-column-data;
      width: 40%;
      border: 3px solid #000;
    }
  }

  // -----------twin images
  #about-twin-images {
    width: 100vw;
    background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    @include flex-column-data;
    background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

    .wrapper-about-img {
      width: 98%;
      height: 110vh;
      @include flex-row-data;
      justify-content: space-evenly;
    }

    .about-img-one {
      width: 48%;
      height: 100%;
      margin: 0;
      background-color: #f3f3f3;
      background-size: 100%;
      background-image: url(../img/simurgh-grand.jpg);
      background-repeat: no-repeat;
      background-position: center;
    }

    .about-img-two {
      width: 46%;
      height: 100%;
      background-image: url(../img/anacridium-black_grand.jpg);
      @extend .about-img-one;
    }
  }
}
// -------------------------------------

// ---------------3D--------------------
#port3d {
  width: 100vw;
  padding: 0 0 30px 0;
  background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  @include flex-column-data;

  p {
    width: 60%;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    text-align: left;
    line-height: 28px;
    padding: 100px 10px 100px 60px;
    font-family: $font_family_thin_naomi_legs;
    font-weight: 100;
    color: #212121;

    span {
      @include underline-simple;
    }
  }

  // 1 TEXT ABOUT
  .port3d-text {
    height: 80vh;
    margin-top: 50px;
    background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

    @include flex-column-data;

    h3 {
      font-size: 1.3rem;
      text-align: left;
      line-height: 31px;
      margin: 0px 30px 0px 60px;

      font-family: $font_family_thin_naomi_legs;
      color: #000;
    }
    p {
      width: 60%;
      font-size: 1.3rem;
      text-align: left;
      line-height: 34px;
      padding: 5px 10px 30px 60px;
      font-family: $font_family_thin_naomi_legs;
      font-weight: 100;

      color: #282828;

      span {
        font-style: italic;
        padding-bottom: 2px;
        border-bottom: 2px solid #000;
      }
    }
  }

  // ----------- images
  .port-3d-image {
    width: 98%;
    height: 100vh;

    @include flex-column-data;
    background-image: url(../img/city-1_Meyoko.jpg);
    background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center;
    background-size: 90%;
  }
}
// -------------------------------------
// -------------------------------------
// ---------------Cases--------------------
#cases {
  width: 100vw;
  @include flex-column-data;

  h3 {
    padding: 120px 0 60px 0;
    color: #505050;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-family: $font_family_thin_naomi_legs;
  }

  .wrapper-cases {
    width: 90%;
    height: 80vh;
    @include flex-row-data;

    .case-one {
      width: 30%;
      height: 100%;
      margin: 2px;
      background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

      p {
        padding: 30px;
        color: #666666;
        font-size: 1.1rem;
        font-family: $font_family_thin_naomi_legs;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        color: #212121;

        span {
          color: rgb(98, 98, 98);
          text-transform: capitalize;
          font-family: "Lato";
          font-weight: 100;
          font-size: 1rem;
        }
      }

      .image {
        width: 95%;
        @include flex-column-data;
        background-color: rgb(214, 214, 214);
        img {
          min-width: 100%;
          height: auto;
        }
      }
    }

    .case-two {
      @extend .case-one;
    }

    .case-three {
      @extend .case-one;
    }
  }
}

// -------------------------------------
// -------------------------------------
// -------------Footer--------------------
footer {
  margin-top: 150px;
  width: 100vw;

  h3 {
    color: rgb(197, 118, 118);
    padding: 100px 0 100px 0;
    font-size: 4rem;
    font-family: $font_family_fat;
  }

  .footer-wrapper {
    width: 100%;
    height: 40vh;
    background-color: #ffffff;
    @include flex-column-data;

    .dot {
      width: 100%;
      height: 70%;
      background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

      a {
        @include flex-column-data;
        width: 10px;
        height: 10px;
        border-radius: 100%;
        background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
      }
    }

    .social-links {
      width: 60%;
      height: 15%;
      background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
      @include flex-row-data;
      justify-content: space-evenly;

      ul {
        list-style: none;
        li {
          display: inline;
          a {
            color: rgb(160, 160, 160);
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            text-decoration: none;
            font-family: "Lato-thin";
            font-weight: 600;

            @include underline-thin;
            &:hover {
              border-bottom-color: rgb(172, 172, 172);
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }

    .copyright {
      width: 100%;
      height: 15%;
      @include flex-row-data;
      background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

      p {
        color: #666;
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        font-family: "Lato-thin";
        font-weight: 600;
      }
    }
  }
}
